name: Trying Tile
description:
A thoughtful infinite puzzle game. How far can you get?

Instruction

  1.                         the goal is to make all tiles red.
  2.                         Click a tile to change each tile in it's row and column to the next color in the rainbow (Red, Orange, Yellow, Green, Blue, Purple) . When you get to purple, the color will loop back to red.
  3.                          Once all tiles are red, the next level will begin automatically.
  4.                          Level number indicates the minimum number of clicks to solve (though more can be used).
